page.title: 14The Boat Trip (continued).
page.content: We carried on North past Gannets Rock and we saw Guillimots,Razor Bills, Shags and Kittiwakes. When we got to Seals Rock I saw another Puffin in the water.Then I saw a rock sticking out of the water with a peculiar grey flabby thing on it.It was a Grey Seal pup.Then I had the fright of my life, we suddenly shot out to sea,we had to go far out because of the rocks on the N.W.Point. When we finally slowed down we were on the windward side (the west) of the island at St.James Stone. There wasn't so much to see on this side,except in Jenny's Cove where we saw thousands of birds:Guillimots, Kittiwakes,Razorbills,Shags and Great Black-backed Gulls.We carried on past Battery Point and Montagu Steps. Then we got to Black Rock and I had a fright again as we went fast round the corner into Rattles Anchorage.(cont.)
